name: dftfe

variants.name: scalapack
variants.description: Use ScaLAPACK, strongly recommended for problem sizes >5000 electrons

description: Real-space DFT calculations using Finite Elements

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: dealii
dependencies.description:
C++ software library providing well-documented tools to build finite
element codes for a broad variety of PDEs.

dependencies.name: alglib
dependencies.description:
ALGLIB is a cross-platform numerical analysis and data processing
library.

dependencies.name: libxc
dependencies.description:
Libxc is a library of exchange-correlation functionals for density-
functional theory.

dependencies.name: spglib
dependencies.description: C library for finding and handling crystal symmetries.

dependencies.name: libxml2
dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.
